name: Bistro Beef Burritos
description: Staring into your fridge and wondering what to do with all those leftover odds and ends? Here’s your answer! Burritos are a great way to amp up leftovers. Use this recipe as a starting point, but swap in whatever you have at home. Get rollin’—assemble a bunch to freeze for make-ahead dinners or grab-and-go lunches.

ingredients.name: boneless beef blade pot roast or chuck roast

preparation: Preheat oven to 400° F. Line Sheet Pan with Sheet Pan Liner.
In a medium bowl, combine shredded beef with rice. Slice avocado.
Divide beef mixture, avocado, spinach, and cheese between tortillas. Fold in sides and roll up.
Arrange burritos on pan. Bake 15 min, flipping halfway, until lightly golden.
Slice burritos in half to serve. Serve each with 2 tbsp salsa and sour cream.

summary: A gastro-pub fave, it’s now easy – and so darn tasty – to make Beef Dip at home.
